segments.text: Could you check my list to see whether I have forgotten anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will open the suitcase and you read through the list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I am done . You have nothing on the list left behind . But I suggest you take sneakers with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is necessary for you to walk on the street . Otherwise , it will be not good to wear high heeled shoes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That makes sense . I will do it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You do need to take some medicines with you . Just in case .
segments.speaker: S2
